mapper.sql: vid, name, video_url, photo_url, delete_flag, created_at, creator, remark
mapper.insert: insert into video (vid, name, video_url, photo_url, delete_flag, created_at, creator, remark) values (#{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into video
vid,
name,
video_url,
photo_url,
delete_flag,
created_at,
creator,
remark,

mapper.update:
update video
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo_url = #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update video set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_url = #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from video WHERE delete_flag!=1
AND name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' )
mapper.update: update video SET delete_flag = 1 where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
